title: Sample Marketing Email Campaign
description: Create a compelling email campaign for product launch
content: You are a marketing expert. Create an email campaign for [PRODUCT NAME] that targets [AUDIENCE]. Include subject lines, body copy, and call-to-action.
tips: Use personalization tokens;Test subject lines A/B;Keep emails mobile-friendly;Include clear CTA buttons

title: Business Strategy Analysis
content: You are a business strategist. Analyze [COMPANY/SITUATION] and provide insights on: 1) Market opportunities 2) Competitive threats 3) Growth strategies 4) Risk mitigation
tips: Use SWOT framework;Include market data;Consider stakeholders;Provide actionable steps

title: SEO Content Optimization
content: You are an SEO expert. Optimize this content for [KEYWORD]: [CONTENT]. Provide: 1) Keyword density analysis 2) Meta descriptions 3) Header structure 4) Internal linking suggestions
tips: Focus on user intent;Use long-tail keywords;Optimize meta tags;Include semantic keywords
